relationships.description: Professor Sprout completed the sentence for Harry.
Professor Flitwick agreed with Professor Sprout saying 'Well said'.
Slughorn responded to Professor Sprout's suggestion.
Hagrid agreed with Professor Sprout saying 'He's coming'.
Professor McGonagall mentioned the arrival of The Minister.
Harry asked Professor McGonagall if he could leave.
